subject: Play on the Simsonn SQ Pro
description_text:
Hello. I recently got a SQ Pro on aliexpress and been using it for 10 days now. I notice that there are a lot of play in the center position and it seems to be getting worse with usage. I already tried to tighten all the screws but it did not go away. Is there a way to get rid of this play or is it an issue with my unit?. There is a video attached showing the issue.


Thanks!

conversations.body_text: Hi Raul Ramires,     The silver embedded nuts on both sides are used to adjust the centering and shifting force. You can tighten them slightly—similar to adjusting a handbrake—but make sure both sides are adjusted evenly. Do not overtighten, as it may cause the shifter to jam when engaging gears.
I already tried to tighten it. But it does not solve the play. the play is only gone if I tighten it at the point that the shifter will not even move.

Hi Raul Ramires,    We will send you a new torsion spring on October 9th.  We’ll also provide a video guide to help you replace it — this should resolve the issue.  Please provide your contact name, address, phone number, and order number.

Thanks! I really appreciate it. But I have a question: Will I have to pay the import custom fee?           name: Raul Ramires  address: Avenida Antonio Bortoloto 1409  city: Maringá - PR  country: Brazil  postal code: 87103-278     order number: 8204416378927647  Bought on Aliexpress Official Store
Hi Raul Ramires,    You don’t need to cover any customs duties or shipping fees.  If there are any, the amount should be small, and we can reimburse you via PayPal.
Hi Raul Ramires,  Your order has been shipped. The logistics number is:YT2528300704598641. You can track it at this website https://www.17track.net/zh-cn.
Can you please send me a video instruction on how to replace the spring? Thanks!

Hi Raul Ramires,  This is the spring replacement video.      https://drive.google.com/file/d/15CFmRx99jD5XLC79d6UZ8R7KdaxytMZ2/view?usp=drive_link     https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fiEh5ov6qwUDfHvnrEhi1jYj0jF7GIeK/view?usp=drive_link
Hello. I had to pay a total of R$33,40 of importing fees for the package
Hi Raul Ramires,  Hello, how much is it when converted to USD? Please provide your PayPal address, and I’ll transfer the payment to you.
Hello. R$33,40 = USD 6,22  My Paypal email is rrramires @hotmail.com.     Thanks!

Hi Raul Ramires,  Hello, I’ve received your payment. Thank you very much for your support! If you encounter any issues in the future, please feel free to contact us directly — we’ll respond quickly and help you resolve them.

Hi Raul Ramires,    Hello, we’ve sent you a payment of USD 6.22. Thank you very much for your support! If you encounter any issues in the future, please feel free to contact us — we’ll assist you as quickly as possible.
Hello. I received the payment. Thank you so much for the amazing support. You guys are awesome!
